channel.title: Troll-Scape Reborn! (it's just a name the server is serious.)
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i1233.photobucket.com/albums/ff382/michaelzzzzzz/troll-scape_o-1.gif[/img][/center]
[size=14pt] This was a server I played before it was fun to play and so remade it.[/size]
[img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/3416/homdoug.png[/img] [img]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/6126/shopss.png[/img] [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/633/36187191.png[/img] [img]http://img143.imageshack.us/img143/4862/monsterteles.png.png[/img] [img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4877/minigamesg.png[/img] [img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/4559/modzone.png[/img] [img]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/4440/secondmostplayerson.png[/img] [img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/3079/skillershangout.png[/img] [img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4935/robes.png[/img] [img]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/3561/rangey.png[/img] [img]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/6551/rangesupplies.png[/img] [img]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/1083/generalqi.png[/img] [img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/3943/drags.png[/img] [img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/691/clancapes.png[/img]
[size=12pt]NOTE: For the shop images I have coded that into a different server and have incorporated it into my server.[/size]
[size=18pt]Positions to Apply for:[/size]
Hoster: [code]Name: Time you can host for: Timezone: MSN or contact:[/code]
GFX and Webdesigner. [code]Name: Proof of your work: Timezone: MSN or contact:[/code]
All staff will be hand picked in game.
